lines.text:
[after he heard someone other than Boregart talking]
Hey, Boregart, say "bottle of beer."

[Grizelda walks in with a well on her body]
If I hear anybody laugh, one wise crack, one snicker out of any of you and I'll turn you into a toad.
[Arthur starts to snicker and laugh out loud to the point where Grizelda zaps him and turns him into a toad]
